about_the_game:
This is a plot game that uses mouse interaction and level puzzle solving. The player plays an enthusiastic resident who will help neighbors who are in trouble.
The player continues the game plot by clicking on the dialogue. But sometimes, players need to use common sense to drag items on the screen to the corresponding position with the mouse to continue the game.
When you have completed all the puzzle solving levels，you can unlock this DLC nude.The DLC contains 6 nude images of two girls.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some pornography, 
all characters are over 18 years old
